structural_analysis.context_justification: The document begins with the header 'अथ सप्तमोऽध्यायः' (7) and 'प्रथमं ब्राह्मणम्' (1). The first parsed unit (Mantra/Kāṇḍikā) is numbered 1 (॥ १ ॥). Thus, the starting coordinate is 7.1.1.
structural_analysis.filename_justification: Combines grantha ID, commentary author slug, and zero-padded start ID (07-01-01) for unique, sortable naming.

proposed_strategy.name: Validated Group by Character Count (Single Chunk)
proposed_strategy.description: Since the total size of the entire Adhyaya (Brāhmaṇas 1-15 including commentary) is significantly below the safety limit, the entire content is grouped into a single chunk for optimal efficiency.

execution_plan.description: The entire Seventh Adhyāya, covering Brāhmaṇas 1 through 15.

parsing_instructions.justification: The Adhyāya is primarily divided into Brāhmaṇas, which represent the major semantic and logical sections of the text and commentary.
parsing_instructions.numbering_capture_strategy: The primary mantra/kāṇḍikā numbers are standard Devanagari numerals enclosed in double pipes at the end of the line (e.g. || 1 ||).

start_pattern.description: A new Brāhmaṇa begins with a bolded header announcing its number, potentially preceded by 'Adhyāye' variations.

end_pattern.description: The end of a Brāhmaṇa block is marked by the concluding colophon of the commentary, usually mentioning the Adhyāya and Brāhmaṇa number.

parsing_instructions.pre_content_handling: The initial lines containing the grantha title, Adhyāya header (अथ सप्तमोऽध्यायः), and topic heading (e.g., [प्रणवप्रशंसा]) should be handled as preparatory metadata for the first Brāhmaṇa.
